data.text: @Michael62241416 @leccydisco @UKCovid19Stats ONS CIS data 3 days late but indicated 1 in 30 of adult pop. would test pos. for #OmicronVariant that is approx. 1.9 million UK citizens or 3.55% of the pop. - not trivial numbers

@FaveFave11 @NickWeb48218460 @UKCovid19Stats By removing all restrictions and stopping testing. That’s ignoring a pandemic. This week to 2nd March there have been 651 deaths and 236,000 cases in the UK alone. Which bit of that is over?
@hertstennistom @NickWeb48218460 @UKCovid19Stats By what measure this Government ignored the pandemic? The pandemic is coming to end as you see all over the world.
@FaveFave11 @NickWeb48218460 @UKCovid19Stats That’s the exact opposite of what I am stating. I want people to do something, not ignore it as Johnson is.
@hertstennistom @NickWeb48218460 @UKCovid19Stats It's a global pandemic, there is no magic wand to make it disappear. Yet people like you think you can somehow make it so.

@hertstennistom @FaveFave11 @NickWeb48218460 @UKCovid19Stats Is it ok that 500 people die of cancer every day! or 450 die of heart disease every day! Is it only covid that concerns you? How stupid can you be?

@Liam92963989 @UKCovid19Stats No lockdowns, but he should keep tests. Should also be encouraging isolation if you have it too. Instead he is simply cutting back on the lot. You may not like Lockdowns, but they will be back with Johnson around and the removal of all precautions.
@hertstennistom @UKCovid19Stats What do you want him to do? Lockdown forever?
@daveburnett1980 @UKCovid19Stats Feel free to use the block button. Death is death. Makes little difference if it could have been prevented. Johnson has blood on his hands.

@Liam92963989 @UKCovid19Stats I don’t want your attention. Feel free to use the block button if you don’t like reality. An extra 194 dead today while Johnson does nothing. That ok with you? A way bigger risk to British lives than Putin.
